name: Onix
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: It twists and squirms through the ground. The thunderous roar of its tunneling echoes a long way.

attacks.name: Screech
attacks.effect: Until the end of your next turn, if an attack damages the Defending Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does 20 more damage to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Onix.
